name: Heirloom (Rachel Heleva)
description:
GO TO SETTINGS ON MAIN MENU AND TURN VOLUME UP PLEASE!! SORRY!

Heirloom is a game about climate change and learning from past generations.

Mibyle- Art & UI

Robin - Programmer & Game Designer & Writer

Athena - Composer & Game Designer

Rachel - Writer & Game Designer

This game was made for Indiecade's 2022 Climate Jam.

This jam version of the game is still rough/unpolished and updates will be coming soon!
